raw_code:
def self.assign_single_users_to_teams(min_team_size, parent, teams, users)
    teams.each do |team|
      curr_team_size = Team.size(team.id)
      member_num_difference = min_team_size - curr_team_size
      while member_num_difference > 0
        team.add_member(users.first, parent.id)
        users.delete(users.first)
        member_num_difference -= 1
        break if users.empty?
      end
generated_comment: # Assigns additional single members (not already assigned to any other team within 'parent') to understaffed teams until each meets minimum size requirement
gold_comment: Assigns list of users to list of teams based on minimum team size
